text: I went to pick up a couple of pizzas and the guy ahead of me picked up my two when ordered one - whatever. When it was all sorted and they realized their mistake they told me it would be a few more minutes but they would remake my pizzas. I ‚Ä¶More

text: Never been disappointed here until today! Prepaid order and had my husband pick it up. Heart shaped cheese pizza for my daughter. It was burned üòû. Not sure if I am more upset that my husband brought it home after seeing it, or that you guys see it as acceptable. My daughter didn't seem to care but she's 7!

text: Customer service is horrible! The crew and manager need to be trained on customer service again ( all grown men BTW)  Waiting 10 min for a customer in front of me to explain his job as someone who does magic shows to the cashier was ridiculous!

text: The service was amazing the waiter was so easy to talk to and gave us everything we asked for. But.....the pizza tasted awful, we ended up getting wings that way we would get a dinner, the wings tasted really good though.

text: Ordered 4 medium pizzas for my family online @ 4:30pm.  Ready on time!  Toppings were right on every pizza!  MOST "BLAH" PIZZA I'VE EVER HAD.  Very little sauce which had NO flavor.  Crust had NO flavor!  (Dogs loved the crust!)  Threw the rest away. If Pizza Hut requires that sauce and crust, I feel sorry for the owner.  Won't be back.

text: You are now charged for cheese and peppers. No notice or notification that after decades of something that is a standard, included item, you'll be charged for it. The manager has the audacity to say "well I have a junk drawer full of them at home"  - how does that change anything for us?

text: THEY ARE OPEN!  Recently I posted sadness about this location closed!  I was wrong,. The day I tried to order, OnLINE it posted as perminately closed.  Upon calling the listed number I found they had been hacked.  This location is OPEN.
